publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2700 Brian Adam:Senior British Open Golf Championships—That the Parliament congratulates the Royal Aberdeen Golf Club for securing the opportunity to host the Senior British Open Golf Championships from 21 to 24 July 2005 and commends Aberdeen City Council for sponsoring the event, which will receive extensive TV coverage and will once again allow Aberdeen the opportunity to showcase itself to the world.

S2M-2700 Brian Adam: Senior British Open Golf Championships—That the Parliament congratulates the Royal Aberdeen Golf Club for securing the opportunity to host the Senior British Open Golf Championships from 21 to 24 July 2005 and commends Aberdeen City Council for sponsoring the event, which will receive extensive TV coverage and will once again allow Aberdeen the opportunity to showcase itself to the world. Supported by: Richard Lochhead*, Rob Gibson*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-2700 Senior British Open Golf Championships (lodged on 14 April 2005) Christine Grahame*, Jim Mather*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-2700 Senior British Open Golf Championships (lodged on 14 April 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-2700 Senior British Open Golf Championships (lodged on 14 April 2005) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-2700 Senior British Open Golf Championships (lodged on 14 April 2005) Donald Gorrie*, Mike Pringle*
S2M-2700 Senior British Open Golf Championships (lodged on 14 April 2005) Michael Matheson*
